title: Smart Data Models - NonConformLoadGroup
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Loads that do not follow a daily and seasonal load variation pattern.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be NonConformLoadGroup

EnergyConsumers.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Group of this ConformLoad. Default: 'list'

NonConformLoadSchedules.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The NonConformLoadSchedules in the NonConformLoadGroup. Default: 'list'
